articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Google fixes bug that led AI Overviews to say it’s now 2024 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google has fixed a bug that led AI Overviews to say it's 2024 when it was asked if this year is 2025.
articles.content: AI tools are touted as capable helpers that can easily help you research, code, summarize, write and bring you knowledge of any kind. But sometimes simple questions befuddle them. Google’s AI Overvie… [+1667 chars]
